{"id":981371908,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1687931678,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/981371908/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if(n==0)\n        return(1.0);\n        long long ln=n>0?n:(-1.0*n);\n        double ans=1.0;\n        while(ln)\n        if(ln%2){\n            ans*=x;\n            ln--;\n        }\n        else{\n            x*=x;\n            ln/=2;\n        }\n        return(n>0?ans:double(1.0)/ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
